rooms.name: Mudroom/Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with traditional Kerala elements like tiled floors and ornate woodwork. Incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring a welcoming and auspicious entry, aligned to the east.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open central courtyard with a traditional Kerala style garden and water feature, fostering natural light and ventilation. Vastu compliant with emphasis on the center.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with large windows and Kerala-style wood carving details. Vastu principles encourage energy flow from the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An adjoining dining space with a traditional Kerala tiled floor and minimalistic decor, promoting balance as per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen integrated with traditional Kerala style elements, featuring ample storage and an island counter. Vastu principles recommend placement in the south-east corner.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A guest suite with traditional Kerala-style design. Includes en-suite bathroom and is placed in the north-west corner for positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxuriously designed master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and balcony. Placed in the north-east as per Vastu for health and prosperity.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom in traditional Kerala style with integrated storage and a private balcony. Vastu suggests placing this room towards the west for restful energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A secondary bathroom with traditional Kerala tiling and functional layout. Positioned as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater with immersive audio-visual setup and ambient lighting. Designed as a multi-purpose space integrated into the living area.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet and secluded library with traditional Kerala woodwork and custom bookshelves. Vastu principles suggest placement in the north-east for knowledge.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance door aligned with the eastern side to welcome positive energy. Decorative traditional Kerala elements incorporated.

openings.name: Front Windows
openings.description: Large windows in the living room and dining area designed for ample natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Courtyard Openings
openings.description: Multiple openings around the courtyard to enhance cross-ventilation while maintaining privacy.

openings.name: Balcony Windows
openings.description: Balconies adjoining master and additional bedrooms with traditional wooden grills and ample seating area.

notes.style: Traditional Kerala-style Nalukettu with central courtyard
additional_details: The layout is designed keeping in mind Vastu principles, ensuring auspicious placements of living spaces and functional areas.
Luxury segment features include high-quality finishes, ample natural lighting, and modern amenities integrated into traditional design elements.
